rules.natural: Under the condition that an employee is assigned a task for the project, the project deadline is approaching.
If the employee has the necessary tools, then the employee has access to the software or has temporary access to the software.
If the employee is a senior employee, then whenever that employee is assigned a task for the project, the employee has the necessary tools.
The employee is a senior employee or the employee is a junior employee.
In the case that the employee is a junior employee, if that employee is assigned a task for the project, then the employee has the necessary tools.
If the team has a scheduled meeting in the conference room, the project is completed successfully.

Either the company has a formal remote work policy or the company has a flexible remote work policy.
